players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Bob died overnight. We have 1 mafia among Alice/Charlie/Diana. Detective, please share any result if you have one; otherwise, Alice and Charlie, what are your thoughts and where were your suspicions?"
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night. Please vote Alice today."

You: "A detective claiming on Day 1 with a single result is risky. Charlie, why would mafia kill Bob over you if you had a check? That doesn’t add up. Diana, let’s not rush—what made you suspect Bob last night?"

Diana: "Alice, your push on me is deflection. If Charlie is fake, he gets me to hesitate; if real, we should secure the result. Charlie: confirm your exact result wording on Alice. Alice: who do you vote and why?"

You: "A detective hard-claiming D1 with no fear after a Bob kill screams setup. Diana, if Charlie is real, he’ll win any 1v1 anyway—so let’s test consistency: Charlie, verbatim result text? Diana, I’m voting Charlie."

Charlie: "Result: 'You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.' Alice preemptively knows I’m the detective per my memory. One mafia left; we win by voting Alice today. Diana, lock vote on Alice."
